data.name: Hurraayy
data.description: Hurraayy is Bangladesh travel activity & home sharing platform. I have been working here as a front-end developer, implement API's and design UI's and integrated payment gateway (SSL) to the system. Click card to visit the website

data.name: Stipend
data.description: BD Govt. Stipend project. PSC, JSC, SSC, HSC students will apply for Stipend through this system automatically. I have been designed the system architecture. Worked here as a full stack developer, integrate reporting tools and also integrate Boomcast sms gateway

data.name: e-Procurement
data.description: This system provides all the business of procurement. This is originally developed for H&M Bangladesh. I have been working here as a core developer, like building architecture of the system, develop the system with cloud compatible. Integrate CI/CD pipeline for Continuous integration and Continuous development. Used Azure SendGrid for its notification system. Also used Azure Power Bi and integrate it to the system for its reporting.

languages.name: Azure web app, blob storage, AD

data.name: LeadsVAT
data.description: This system provides all the business of Vat management system according to NBR rules. I have designed the system architecture and integrate reporting tool (JS report)

data.name: TPin
data.description: This system provides Telephonic Pin for Banking ATM cards. Which request will receive from IVR and generate PIN for the requested user. Also Linking related cards for single Account. It is used by Dutch Bangla Bank Limited. I have designed system architecture, developed algorithm for PIN number generation and integrated reporting tool

data.name: CenterPoint-ERP Solutions
data.description: A complete ERP solutions. Specially designed for Pharmaceuticals company. Some big clients of it;s are LEADS, Ziska Pharmaceutical Company, Globex, Coca-cola, Rahimafrooz. I have been working on various modules, like HR, Inventory, Sales Distribution, Sales Operation, Procurement, Product management etc.

data.name: Eclipse Mobile Application
data.description: Simple way to track sales reports according to products or brands. With some simple clicks Request for Credit/Discount for Customer. It is specially developed for Ziska Pharmaceuticals Limited.
